title: Dear Riot: I demand my LP gets adjusted
body:
I just got penalised because your client bugged out on champ select. Internet was working fine but I got into champ select with this black screen. It's only a small amount of LP but I want you to readjust my LP and compensate me for having to wait due to your client failing

My main account is iamthefox

Thanks in advance

replies.body:
LP will not be given back due to you leaving a game. That is their policy. It gets really fuzzy around when it's because the client crashed. To stay on the safe side, and considering how little LP you actually lose for this happening, I'd say you won't get your LP back and your account will be marked for queue-dodging.

You can [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about it and see if they can do anything about it, specific to your account. Have you tried repairing your client thus far (back up item sets first!)?
